name: NSSaveOptions
desc: The saveOptions method returns one of the following constants to indicate how to deal with saving any modified documents:

items.name: case yes
items.desc: Indicates a modified document should be saved on closing without asking the user.

items.name: case no
items.desc: Indicates a modified document should not be saved on closing.

items.name: case ask
items.desc: Indicates the user should be asked before saving any modified documents on closing. When no option is specified, this is the default.
